# President of the Council of State of Nicaragua

The President of the Council of State of Nicaragua was the presiding officer of Nicaragua's interim legislature.
{| class="wikitable"
! Name
! Period
! Party
|-
|Bayardo Arce Castaño
|May 1980 – 1981
|Sandinista National Liberation Front
|-
|Carlos Núñez Téllez
|1981 – 1984
|Sandinista National Liberation Front
|}
Sources
*[https://www.nytimes.com/1990/10/3/obituaries/carlos-nunez-telles-sandinista-leader-39.html Carlos Nunez Tellez - Sandinista Leader, 39 - New York Times]
